A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a bad\, bad\, bad\, bad movie.  The Star Wars franchise is truly dead after this one.  Character motivations don't make sense\, are not believable\, and seem to exist just to support the plot;  a plot\, that doesn't make sense is not compelling or interesting.  Recycled plots\, recycled shots. \nFor people to say that this is the best SW movie ever made\, truly don't know SW..
